name: Saving the King's Princess
description:
My second Game Jam. I joined a bit late, but I still wanted to see what I could do and where I could go in 3 days. So here we are!

This is a Game Jam entry for https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-113

The theme is: 5 Minute Hero

Play as a young Knight for a benevolent king and save his Princess from the Crimson Knights in a race against the clock as wearing your heavy armor wears you down in return.

Or something, have fun!

Started off strong, but slowed down as time went on, at the last minute I realized some changes I could make to make the game better and more responsive.

For a project made from the ground up by myself in 3 days I must say I'm fairly happy with how it turned out.

Feel free to leave comments or suggestions!
